text.div:
This value set contains 23 concepts

All codes in this table are from the system http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codes

CodeDisplay
  POI-1Aadhar Identity Card
  POI-2Passport
  POI-3Driving License
  POI-4Election Commision's Voter ID card
  POI-5Income Tax PAN Card
  POI-6Photo Credit Card/ Debit card (with Photo)
  POI-7ECHS / CGHS Card having photo
  POI-8Domicile Certificate / Caste Certificate with photograph
  POI-9Current passbook of Post Office / Govt. /PSU Bank/private banks
  POI-10Student ID card of the Govt. recognized educational institutions with photograph on it.
  POI-11Ration Card with photograph & address. (Issued from Maharashtra state not valid )
  POI-12Smart Card issued by CSD, Defence / Paramilitary Forces
  POI-13Arms License
  POI-14Senior Citizen Card having photo issued by the Govt.
  POI-15Pensioners Card having photo issued by the Govt.
  POI-16ID Card issued to Tibetan (Refugees) Citizens by State Govt. / Central Govt. of India having photo
  POI-17Defence Personnel - Armed Forces ;Certificate from Competent Unit Authority
  POI-18Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by MP/ MLA / Group A Gazetted Officer on letter head with seal
  POI-19Certificate of address with photo from Govt. recognized educational institution (for students only)
  POI-20Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by Head of Village / Gram Panchayat or its equivalent Authority. (for Rural Areas)
  POI-21Address Card with Photo issued by Dept. of Posts
  POI-23Freedom fighter card with photo
  POI-24Kissan Passbook with photo

name: ProofOfIdentityCodes
description: This is the value set listing the Proof of Identification codes
